title: RoC Multi-Correxion Night Treatment, 1 Ounce
description: The ROC MULTI CORREXION line contains breakthrough products that diminish the appearance of multiple signs of aging with the exclusive fusion of pure RoC RETINOL and antioxidants. RoC MULTI CORREXION Night Treatment provides a comprehensive anti-aging solution to diminish the look of the most noticeable signs of aging and reveal new, younger looking skin.How It WorksThis breakthrough formula contains an exclusive fusion of age-fighting ingredients. Antioxidants help defend against the look of aging. Pure RoC RETINOL smoothes wrinkles and complements skin's natural process. Vitamin C helps rejuvenate skin tone.What Results Can I Expect?In just four weeks, dark circles are visibly diminished and skin tone and luminescence are noticeably improved. In just eight weeks, the appearance of pores and skin discolorations are visibly diminished. In just 12 weeks, the look of fine lines and wrinkles is visibly diminished. Skin firmness and elasticity are also improved. The result -- overall younger-looking, more beautiful skin.Usage TipsApply to face and neck after cleansing. The treatment can be used alone or under your regular moisturizer. For best results, use twice daily. You may experience mild tingling or redness during use. This is normal and should be temporary until your skin adjusts. If applying an additional moisturizer, use one free of Retinol.How Can RoC RETINOL Improve My Skin?Retinol is one of the most effective ingredients for reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles.When you are young, your skin cells continuously renew themselves, which keeps your skin looking smooth. As time passes, however, your skin's ability to renew itself gradually slows down. Skin loses its elasticity and wrinkles become more evident. What you need is something to help keep it looking younger and healthier.This is the benefit of Retinol. Retinol is a pure form of Vitamin A that works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles.RoC MULTI CORREXION Night TreatmentAt a Glance:Diminishes the appearance of wrinklesImproves elasticityBrightens skinDiminishes the look of dark circlesImproves the appearance of poresAdvice for Getting the Most Out of Retinol ProductsStart Early:It is often recommended to begin using a Retinol product in your late twenties to early thirties. Early use of Retinol products can actually help to combat fine lines and wrinkles before they become apparent, so your skin stays looking younger and healthier.Start Slowly:Using Retinol is like exercising. You don't start out running a marathon. Begin by applying a small amount (a little goes a long way) every other day for about two weeks. After two weeks, you may begin applying more frequently until find the best routine for your skin.Stick with It:It is important to be consistent, as the benefits of Retinol are seen over time. If you happen to experience minor skin irritation, this may be temporary while your skin adjusts to the products. Just decrease usage for a few days and work your way back up after that.Protect your skin:Whether you use a Retinol product during the night or day, always remember to wear a sunscreen of SPF 15 or higher during the day.RoC: A History of Skincare ExpertiseRoC brand was founded in France in 1957 by pharmacist Jean-Charles Lissarrague and a collaboration of dermatologists. From the beginning, RoC developed strong partnerships with dermatologists, helping it become the skincare leader in France. In 1999, the makers of RoC brought its anti-aging expertise to the U.S.Since then, RoC has continued to build on its unique understanding of the skin aging process to develop the best and most effective skincare solutions for women in the U.S. RoC products in the U.S. are not only derived from extensive research and thorough clinical studies, but also from a proven track record of success with European women.What's in the BoxRoC MULTI CORREXION Night Treatment (1 Fluid Ounce).Skin Renewing Serum4-Zone Daily Moisturizer SPF 30Night TreatmentEye TreatmentLift Anti-Gravity SerumLift Anti-Gravity Daily Moisture SPF 30Lift Anti-Gravity Eye CreamLift Anti-Gravity Night CreamTrademark Information:RoC® MULTI CORREXION® Night Treatment

title: Obagi System Professional-C  10% Vitamin C Serum, 1-Ounce Bottle (30ml)
description: Obagi Professional-C Serum provides antioxidant protection with deep penetration to the dermal layer.  The 10% L-ascorbic acid helps in defending against damaging UVA and UVB rays, helps prevent premature signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles, and contributes to collagen synthesis.  Obagi Professional-C Serum 10% is suitable for dry, sensitive or reactive skin.

title: Olay Professional Pro-X Discoloration Fighting Concentrate, 0.4 Ounce
Dermalogica Age Smart Skin Resurfacing Cleanser, 5.1 Ounce
description: A dual-action exfoliating cleanser containing lactic acid that smoothes, retexturizes and delivers ultra-clean skin. Recommended for the smart management and treatment of skin aging. Antioxidant vitamin E conditions and enhances softness while fortifying the skin's natural moisture barrier. Soothing rose flower oil calms skin sensitivity.

title: Chrome Azzaro for Men by Azzaro, Eau De Toilette Spray 6.8 Ounces
description: Introduced in 1996. Fragrance notes: a crisp, tangy citrus scent. Recommended use: casual.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Revlon ColorStay Eyeliner with Sharpener, Brown 203, 0.01 Ounce (28 g)
description: Up to 16 hours of smudge-proof wear. Water-proof. Precision glide for smooth control. Creates a fine line of intense color that lasts up to 16 hours. Stays looking freshly applied - won't smudge off or fade away all day. Waterproof. Creamy formula glides on smoothly for expert control. Built in sharpener for a precise line every time. Retractable tip protects against breakage. Ophthalmologist tested. Fragrance free. Suitable for contact lens wearers. Made in Italy.

title: Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Aging Night Resurfacing Elixir 1.7 Fl Oz
Neutrogena Microdermabrasion System
description: Visible Results in Just One UseThe Neutrogena Microdermabrasion System has a combination of exfoliating crystals and microvibrations that deliver refined texture and radiance in just one use.This system is clinically proven to deliver the same results as a microdermabrasion treatment from a dermatologist. You will see smoother, more radiant skin instantly, and firmer, younger-looking skin over time.Dermatologist clinical study proves:Instantly:91% had smoother, more luminous skin1 Week:88% had visible improvement in the look of fine lines4 Weeks:88% had significantly reduced appearance of wrinkles or age spots8 Weeks:72% had substantially firmer-looking skinToday: Softer, More Luminous SkinPre-dosed puffs deliver the perfect degree of gentle exfoliation with ultra-fine crystals and mild purifiers.Tomorrow: Firmer, Younger-Looking SkinMassaging micro-vibrations boost surface cell turnover for firmer, younger-looking skin.How to UseThe Neutrogena Microdermabrasion System is easy and convenient: just use three times per week in place of your regular cleansing scrub.Just one treatment exfoliates and boosts microcirculation to enhance blood flow, resulting in more radiant, smoother skin today and results you and everyone else can see tomorrow.Rejuvenating PuffsEach pre-dosed, one-time-use Microdermabrasion Puff has ultra-fine crystals and mild purifiers that provide the perfect amount of exfoliation.It also contains glycerin to help condition the skin as it exfoliates.Click here to see ingredients list.Continue to keep your skin soft and luminous with theRejuvenating Puffs Refills(sold separately).What's In the BoxOne Neutrogena Microderabrasion System starter kit with microdermabrasion applicator, attachment head, 12 rejuvenating puffs, and two AA Batteries. Includes everything you need to revitalize your skin for one full month.** Replenish your supply with Microderabrasion Rejuvenating Puff Refills (sold separately). Use Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair as your daily skincare solution with your Neutrogena Microdermabrasion System:Rapid Wrinkle Repair Moisturizer SPF 30with UVA/UVB protectionRapid Wrinkle Repair Moisturizer Nightfor visible results in one weekRapid Wrinkle Repair Eye Creamto target fine lines and crow's feetTrademark Information:Neutrogena®

title: St. Ives Timeless Skin Daily Microdermabrasion 4 oz (113 g)
description: St.Ives timeless skin daily microdermabrasion with fine mineral crystals, chamomile & vitamin E. This daily microdermabrasion scrub gently exfoliates to reveal younger looking, refined skin.

title: Perricone MD Citrus Facial Wash, 6 fl. oz.
description: This Vitamin C Ester enhanced facial wash is non-drying, removing impurities, debris and makeup. The Vitamin C Ester in this mild, non-drying formula helps prevent the appearance of redness and blotchiness, sometimes associated with the use of harsh cleansers. The anti-aging cleanser helps improve tone, clarity and texture, unveiling skin's natural radiance. DMAE is added to provide firming benefits by improving facial muscle tone, enhancing contour and diminishing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Suitable for all skin types, though especially recommended for combination skin.
